00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/query_sm_resp.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::QuerySmResp::QuerySmResp() :
00027     Response(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028     CommandId(CommandId::QuerySmResp),
00029     CommandStatus(CommandStatus::ESME_ROK),
00030     SequenceNumber::Min)
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00041 Smpp::QuerySmResp::QuerySmResp(
00042         const CommandStatus& commandStatus,
00043         const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber,
00044         const MessageId& messageId,
00045         const Smpp::Time& finalDate,
00046         const MessageState& messageState,
00047         const ErrorCode& errorCode) :
00048     Response(CommandLength(MinLength),
00049              CommandId(CommandId::QuerySmResp),
00050              commandStatus,
00051              sequenceNumber),
00052     message_id_(messageId),
00053     final_date_(finalDate),
00054     message_state_(messageState),
00055     error_code_(errorCode)
00056 {
00057     Header::update_length(message_id_.length() + final_date_.length());
00058 }
00059 
00062 Smpp::QuerySmResp::QuerySmResp(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00063     Response(CommandLength(MinLength),
00064               CommandId(CommandId::QuerySmResp),
00065               CommandStatus(CommandStatus::ESME_ROK),
00066               1)
00067 {
00068     decode(b);
00069 }
00070 
00071 Smpp::QuerySmResp::~QuerySmResp()
00072 {
00073 }
00074 
00078 const Smpp::Uint8*
00079 Smpp::QuerySmResp::encode()
00080 {
00081     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00082 
00083     Response::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00084     buff_ += message_id_;
00085     buff_ += final_date_;
00086     buff_ += message_state_;
00087     buff_ += error_code_;
00088 
00089     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00090 
00091     return buff_.get();
00092 }
00093 
00097 void
00098 Smpp::QuerySmResp::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00099 {
00100     Response::decode(buff);
00101 
00102     Smpp::Uint32 len = Response::command_length();
00103     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00104     const char* err = "Bad length in query_sm_resp";
00105     if(len < offset)
00106         throw Error(err);
00107 
00108     const Smpp::Char* sptr = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00109 
00110     message_id_ = &sptr[offset];
00111     offset += message_id_.length() + 1;
00112     if(len < offset)
00113         throw Error(err);
00114 
00115     final_date_ = &sptr[offset];
00116     offset += final_date_.length() + 1;
00117     if(len < offset)
00118         throw Error(err);
00119 
00120     message_state_ = buff[offset];
00121     ++offset;
00122     if(len < offset)
00123         throw Error(err);
00124 
00125     error_code_ = buff[offset];
00126     ++offset;
00127     if(len < offset)
00128         throw Error(err);
00129 
00130     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00131 }
